channel.title: docker-compose on IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in docker-compose on IT Quicktasks

item.title: Install Docker Compose
item.description: sudo yum install epel-release sudo yum install -y python-pip sudo pip install docker-compose Further details in https://www.digitalocean.com/community/tutorials/how-to-install-and-use-docker-compose-on-centos-7
